profile:
ROYAL GREEN IRRIGATION was established in 2003 in Toronto Ontario and currently serves customers throughout the GTA. We started in business specializing in irrigation and service to residential and commercial sprinkles systems. As the leaders in our industry sector, we take great pride in offering the highest level of service to all of our customers. Our strong commitment to quality products and excellence in service has lead to many satisfied and loyal customers returning year after year.
 
ROYAL GREEN IRRIGATION services all Brands of irrigation systems and estimates are free. We understand that a major component to maintaining a healthy lush landscape is the necessity for proper watering. Applying the right amount of water in the right places at the right time is vital to your landscapes existence. A fully automatic irrigation system accomplishes all of these tasks while you are sleeping or enjoying time away at the cottage. Water is a precious commodity and the benefits of irrigation are in its conservation. Call ROYAL GREEN IRRIGATION today, your gardens and lawn will never look better.

profile:
A,A Waters & Brookes is dedicated to installing and servicing lawn sprinklers that meet the specific needs of our customers. We use only top quality material and the latest technology to guarantee system reliability and longevity, and every system is designed to maintain uniformity of coverage. Our Team members are Certified Irrigation Technicians, Landscape Technicians, and Backflow Testers. We also employ a full office staff to answer all of your questions and ensure the best possible customer service.
 
A. A. Waters & Brookes has been in business for over 28 years and is owned and operated by a professional engineer who is a certified irrigation contractor and designer. We work with home owners, landscape contractors, home builders and general contractors throughout Toronto, the GTA and southern Ontario. The company ensures that your lawn sprinkler and irrigation systems are designed, installed and maintained to your satisfaction

We design and install a lawn sprinkler or irrigation system to fit your specific application.
Materials are selected based on a proven track record of reliability and performance, not lowest cost.
Your system is installed by full-time, certified irrigation technicians who have the skills and experience to install your system properly with minimal disruption to your home and the utmost respect for your property
We service all makes of sprinkler systems
All our services, including installation, are supervised and directed by a Professional Engineer with more than 38 years experience in underground engineering and design

profile:
Ontario Green Irrigation is the company to service your irrigation needs in the GTA and the surrounding areas. Our mission is to beautify residential properties through quality lawn and shrub irrigation.
At Ontario Green Irrigation, we take pride in serving our customers. It's our desire to exceed your expectations in every way. We’d love to hear from you anytime. Contact us by phone or complete our online form and someone will be in touch with you to answer any questions or hear any suggestions you might have. 
We build irrigation systems that conserve water and automate the process of caring for lawns. Very little needs to be done on the part of our clients to achieve a healthy landscape. We coordinate with the town, take all necessary measurements and arrange for a licensed plumber to complete the hook-up with your plumbing system. Our state of the art equipment allows us to be efficient and available at all times. It also allows us to spend more time getting to know the needs of each particular lawn and customize the system accordingly.  
We are trained and experienced professional irrigation contractors with a history of customer satisfaction in both system installation and service We will select the right Rain Bird products for the unique needs of your landscape, program your controlled to operate at maximum efficiency, and instruct you on how to adjust your system's watering schedule to meet seasonal requirements.
service_area: Brampton, Mississauga, Etobicoke, North York, King City, Nobleton, Gormley, Markham, Vaughan, Toronto, GTA,
products:
We carry full lines of the most popular and good qualtiy sprinkler brands of Rotors, Spray heads, Electric Valves, Controllers, Drip Irrigation, Rain Sensors, etc. As a Rainbird Select Contractor we will install quality irrigation systems with genuine Rain Bird products.
Ontario Green Irrigation proudly uses almost exclusively Hunter and Rainbird Irrigation Products. Hunter and Rainbird products are known as the "Cadillac" of the industry and include a complete lines of sprinklers, rotary heads, shrub heads, valves, controllers (timers) and a variety of accessory products, including rain sensors. Many Hunter and Rainbird products are guaranteed for up to 5 years and can be replaced for labor costs only in the event of failure.
Rotary Sprinkler Rotor-type sprinklers have one or more moving streams of water that rotate around the sprinkler head.
Spray Sprinkler Spray-type sprinklers spray a fan of water out of the nozzle, similar to a shower head.
Valves Electric solenoid valves used for turning on irrigation circuits (sprinklers or drip emitters.) Includes anti-siphon, angle, and globe type valves.
Controllers Controllers are fancy timers used to turn on and off automatic valves.
services:
REPAIR ALL BRANDS OF LAWN SPRINKLERS QUICKLY AND PROPERLY.
Our service techs are experienced and well-trained, and our service trucks are equipped with the latest troubleshooting equipment which allows us to quickly diagnose, troubleshoot, and properly repair all brands of sprinkler systems.
RE-ROUTING A SPRINKLER SYSTEM during swimming pool construction is no problem for Fellows Irrigation. We will cap off existing irrigation to permit usage of lawn sprinklers in areas not affected by construction, then re-route sprinklers around pool as needed to maintain a beautiful backyard.
INSTALL NEW LAWN SPRINKLERS SYSTEM - Ontario Green Irrigation will custom-design and install your system to give the most efficient, cost effective lawn sprinkler possible. Zone landscape areas to water according to watering needs. Landscape areas in full shade (between houses, for example) need less water than full sun areas. Proper zoning of your system will cost more to install but save you money in the future as well as save our most precious resource - water!
QUALITY PRODUCTS COMBINED WITH SKILLED SERVICE TECHS is what Ontario Green Irrigation is about and what will make you a satisfied customer.
brands: As a Rainbird Select Contractor we will install quality irrigation systems with genuine Rain Bird products.

profile:
Geramon Irrigation has been in business over 2 years, in which we are very proud of. One of the reasons for our success is our Service Department, quick, professional, dependable, courteous service is our goal. We have a full time staff of technicians to fill all of your service needs, from the smallest adjustments to the redesign of your system due to landscape or other changes to your property.

We train each technician a minimum of four seasons before they are allowed to service systems on their own. Irrigation is a unique profession, each technician has to know all aspects of the industry, plumbing, electrical, system design, trouble shooting, general building construction, and so much more. To support our technicians in the field we have a full time office staff to answer your questions and schedule your service appointments.
